summary: After an elderly maid is murdered, opinions are manipulated, evidence is planted, violence erupts, and panic ensues.
cast: Viviane Romance|Michel Simon|Max Dalban|Émile Drain|Guy Favières|Louis Florencie|Charles Dorat|Lucas Gridoux|Marcel Pérès|Lita Recio|Michel Ardan|Michèle Auvray|Lucien Carol|Olivier Darrieux|Paulette Laurent|Paul Franck|Magdeleine Gidon|Jenny Leduc|Louis Lions|Emma Lyonel|Jean-François Martial|Lucien Paris|Sylvain|Paul Bernard|Robert Balpo|Fernand Dally|Suzanne Desprès|Germaine Géranne
title: Panique
